languages.text: The first enemy that attacks this creature in the current {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} will be cursed for 2 rounds.
languages.original_text: Первый противник, атаковавший это существо в текущем {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунде{/g}, оказывается проклят на 2 раунда.

traits.locale_text: The first enemy that attacks this creature in the current round will be cursed for 2 rounds.

languages.text: Der erste Gegner, der diese Kreatur in der laufenden {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} angreift, wird 2 Runden lang verflucht.

languages.text: Le premier ennemi qui attaque cette créature lors du {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} en cours est maudit pendant 2 rounds.

languages.text: 每{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}中，首个攻击此生物的敌人会被诅咒两轮。
